eu_initiatives: The RAC Foundation aims to follow EU initiatives, policies and legislative files which have relevance the the UK transport environment
organisation_name: Royal Automobile Club Foundation for Motoring Limited (RAC Foundation)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: The RAC Foundation conducts a programme of Research and Data work across any given year. All published outputs can be viewed and freely downloaded at www.racfoundation.org
goals__remit: The RAC Foundation is a transport policy and research organisation which explores the economic, mobility, safety and environmental issues relating to roads and their users. The Foundation publishes independent and authoritative research with which it promotes informed debate and advocates policy in the interest of the responsible motorist.
